title: Best nootebok for me?
body:
Hi,
I'm going to highschool and i would like to buy a new nootebook. 
This laptop should be on normal things like Powerpoint, Word etc., then it should be light because i will travel a lot and dont want to spent a lot of money, but i would like to really play LOL on it.
Do you thing Macbook Air 13 is a good choice? Would you recommend me something else? Please I am lost. 
[macbookair](https://istyle.cz/macbook-air-13-retina-128gb-zlaty.html)
